summary: Sonic Youth was an influential American rock band from New York City, active from 1981 to 2011. The core members were Kim Gordon, Thurston Moore, Lee Ranaldo, and Steve Shelley. They started in the experimental music scene but later became a popular noise rock band. Sonic Youth was known for their unique guitar sounds and tunings. They gained a large fan base and critical acclaim, especially in the 1990s and 2000s. The band broke up after Gordon and Moore's divorce, and they have not reunited.
title: Sonic Youth
